channel.title: New to 508's how to change player rights?
channel.description:
Okay i see 508's are wayyy better then 317's so i decided to try it out. And now i am trying to change player rights, and everytime i go to, BIN>DATA>CHARACTERS>MAINSAVE, and when i change this...
started:1 rights:0
to this...
started:1 rights:3
i become a noob, and everything restarts. i am using tokkulscape source, help would be appreciated.

item.title: New to 508's how to change player rights?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“aznboi594, post:6, topic:353097”]Sorry I usually use notepad or notepad ++.[/quote]In his case, using notepad would reset the character file every time.

Read full topic

[quote=“aznboi594, post:4, topic:353097”]You need to use Notepad not wordpad.[/quote]You said it oppositely…

[quote=“DarienM, post:3, topic:353097”]thanks david, helps appreciated btw i like your source its, really cool

oh, and do i have to use wordpad for ALL things i edit?[/quote]Just the .dat files

item.source: New to 508's how to change player rights?

item.title: New to 508's how to change player rights?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Firstly, you need to make sure you open the file in WordPad, not NotePad. Then you need to change your rights to 2, which is admin in 508. There is no rights 3 in a 508.

Read full topic
